Keyboard shortcuts for Origami Studio

A visual cheat-sheet for the 71 keyboard shortcuts found in Origami Studio. This application is MacOS-only.

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Insert patch

  • Opt
  • Enter

Insert layer

  • Cmd
  • Enter

Documentation

  • Cmd
  • /

Patches

Interaction

  • I

Switch

  • S

Pop animation

  • A

Classic animation

  • C

Transition

  • T

Keyboard

  • K

Delay

  • D

  • Shift
  • I

  • O

Splitter

  • X

  • W

  • Shift
  • W

  • U

Add

  • +

Minus

  • -

  • *

  • /

  • %

  • Shift

  • N

  • E

  • >

Less than

  • <

Progress

  • Shift
  • R

  • R
